summary: REQ-16 appears implemented via centralized design tokens (CSS variables/Tailwind) by shifting the gold accent token to a brighter yellow and updating ring color. REQ-17 is largely implemented via a new BrandLogo component used in Navbar/Footer and favicon/OG links added to frontend/index.html, but the diff summary does not show the actual image assets being added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-provided Baidees Salon logo as a static asset (square + horizontal) and generate/favicon/apple-touch/og images from it, loaded from frontend static assets.
missing_requirements.reason: Code references image paths under /assets/generated, and index.html links to favicon/apple-touch/og images, but the diff summary does not show any image/static asset files being added to the frontend. Without the actual assets present, the requirement is not fully verifiable from this diff.
